Avatars

Create an avatar of different sizes.

To get a rounded avatar add .avatar and then choose between three different sizes: .avatar-sm, .avatar-md and .avatar-lg.

<img src="assets/img/tim.jpg" class="avatar avatar-sm" alt="Tim Schoch">
<img src="assets/img/tim.jpg" class="avatar avatar-md" alt="Tim Schoch">
<img src="assets/img/tim.jpg" class="avatar avatar-lg" alt="Tim Schoch">
